text: Sex and the City (advertised as Sex and the City: The Movie) is a 2008 American romantic comedy movie written and directed by Michael Patrick King in his feature movie directorial debut. It is a continuation of the 1998â€“2004 television series about four friends, Carrie Bradshaw (Sarah Jessica Parker), Samantha Jones (Kim Cattrall), Charlotte York Goldenblatt (Kristin Davis), and Miranda Hobbes (Cynthia Nixon), and their lives in New York City. == Other websites == * * * Category:2008 romantic comedy movies Category:2008 LGBT movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies about weddings Category:Movies based on TV series Category:Movies set in Asia Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the United Arab Emirates
title: Sex and the City (movie)
